law.text: The commission itself may take depositions, or grant deposition rights at its discretion to any party in a proceeding before the commission. Depositions in commission proceedings shall be taken in accordance with the Rules of Civil Procedure.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 215, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 82, sec. 38, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 379, sec. 41, effective April 1, 1979. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3952-39.
